prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with a shiny blue shell and multiple glowing eyes.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a giant ladybug with vibrant red and black colors.
Generate a creature that is both insectoid and psychic, with intricate patterns on its wings.
Make a Pokemon inspired by a beetle, featuring blue accents and a round, shiny body.
Imagine a mystical bug Pokemon that can control light, with a striking color palette.
Design an elegant bug-type Pokemon with a sleek body and a mesmerizing pattern.
Show me a Pokemon that combines elements of nature and intelligence, with a colorful appearance.
